name: Dicy Pong Variant
description:
What is Dicy Pong Variant ? 

In Dicy Pong variant you have 2 different way to win which are the following :

- Score 20 point.

- Down your opponent score to less than -20.(Yes it is possible ! )

How to play ?
First of all you will have to go on "Setting" inside the game in order to chose the game language (English is set by default).

Then you can enjoy the game !
